DOC.brief_title: Transbronchial Needle Aspiration Diagnosis Peripheral Pulmonary Malignancy
DOC.detailed_description: In recent systematic literature review ( Rivera PM , Mehta AC ; Chest 2007 ; 132 : 1318-1488 ) TBNA show high sensitivity diagnostic bronchoscopic approach peripheral pulmonary lesion , compare available sample technique ( transbronchial biopsy , brushing , washing ) . However , Authors conclude data regard TBNA set deserve cautious interpretation limit number study large difference sample size ) . We design present study assess performance characteristic TBNA , alone comparison transbronchial biopsy , diagnosis peripheral pulmonary lesion .
